id.description: Property.  A name for this grasp

post_place_posture.description: Property.  The internal posture of the hand for the grasp  positions and efforts are used

place_pose.description: Property.  The position of the end-effector for the grasp relative to a reference frame  (that is always specified elsewhere, not in this message)

quality.description: Property.  The estimated probability of success for this place, or some other  measure of how "good" it is.
